name: Playroom Racer 2
description:
Small cars, big fun! Playroom Racer 2 is a 3D toy car racer for all ages.

FEATURES
- 5 beautiful scenes to explore (2 for free)
- 9 different vehicles (4 for free)
- 3 game modes
- Stunning 3D graphics powered by Metal on compatible devices
- Realistic physics simulation
- Easy to learn touch or tilt controls
- Game Center leaderboards
